title: Font used for Amazon.com Logo
content: Does anyone know what font is used for the amazon.com logo. I've read that it is Officina Sans Bold & Roman, but the top of the lowercase "a" curves and slopes a little more than Officina Sans, same for lowercase "c." Also, the stems for lowercase m and n are curved a little in Officina Sans while they are squared off in the Amazon.com logo. Any ideas?
author: DarkNight40

comments.content: I think it's a custom crafted job borrowing ideas from a few different faces as you allude, with Helvetica Condensed closest to the ".com".
